channel.title: Electric Bikes 101 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Electric Bikes 101 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: What Are Ebike ‘Classes’ and What Do They Mean?
item.description: Electric bikes are broadly designated as Class 1, 2, or 3. What class it is determines what’s legal to ride and where.
